text: "Don't Believe Anymore" is a 1984 song by Australian new wave band Icehouse. It is the second single from their third studio album Sidewalk. It went to number 31 in Australia and number 36 in New Zealand. ==The Whitlams version== "Don't Believe Anymore" was covered by Australian band The Whitlams and went to number 47 in Australia. It was taken from their fifth studio album Torch the Moon. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Icehouse (band) songs Category:The Whitlams songs
title: Don't Believe Anymore
